author: Jacques Bezuidenhout
description: A fabulous drink, especially when VEP Chartreuse, family reserve cognac and 20 year old tawny port are used as per the original Starlight Room recipe.
name: Angel's Share No.2

recipeInstructions.text: POUR the Chartreuse into glass and coat the inside of the glass with the liqueur by tilting and rotating it
Carefully set the liqueur on the inside of the glass alight and allow it to BURN for a few seconds
Extinguish flame by placing a saucer over the glass, add other ingredients and SWIRL to mix
